room_title: Escape room "The School of Sorcery" by Exit Game in Los Angeles
room_address: 111 N. Atlantic Blvd., #148 Monterey Park, CA 91754
room_description: It's your first year as a wizard. You must undergo a series of magical exams to prove your abilities. Conjure up spells, and concoct potions with your classmates. However, be wary, dark things lurk the halls of our school. Be prepared to battle the evils inside.
